name: multidimensionality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or quality of having many different features: The article explores the multidimensionality of the concept of culture. A new approach is needed in order to do justice to the multi-dimensionality of engineering. Related word
multidimensional
More examplesFewer examplesThe multidimensionality of these networks was crucial.The book is difficult reading at times because of its multidimensionality.Researchers need to take into account more systematically the multidimensionality of contextual influence.The research explores the multidimensionality of social-psychological influences within and across hierarchical levels of children's environments.
